response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, holds an intrinsic value of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. I am confident that this offer represents a compelling value proposition, allowing you to maximize your investment while enjoying the advantages this product provides. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
